name: Productboard <> GitLab integration
description: A sample GitLab integration using Node.js app and Express

GITLAB_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying your GitLab access. More info here: https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/user/profile/personal_access_tokens.html

PB_TOKEN.description: Your Productboard API token located in the Integration settings. More info here: https://developer.productboard.com/#section/Authentication/Getting-a-token

GITLAB_PROJECT_ID.description: The ID of the GitLab project you want Productboard features pushed to.

PB_INTEGRATION_ID.description: The ID of your Productboard plugin integration. Located in the response of the POST request sent in Postman. *To be configured after initial app is deployed.
